title: Celtics’ Jaylen Brown earns his first NBA All-Star starter nod
author: Khari A. Thompson
bullets: Boston Celtics Brown is off to one of the best starts of his career and earned another accolade for it.
Jaylen Brown Barry Chin/The Boston Globe Jaylen Brown will be one of five starters for the Eastern Conference in next month’s NBA All-Star game, the league announced Monday.
It will be Brown’s fifth All-Star appearance and first time starting the game.

title: ESPN’s Dan Orlovsky trolls Patriots defense after win over Texans
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: New England Patriots "If you're Houston, you win that game with 31 other quarterbacks.

title: Celtics’ Derrick White is picking Broncos over Patriots in AFC championship game
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: Boston Celtics "They got a lot of Patriots fans around here, but I’m holding it down for Denver.
" Derrick White is staying loyal to his hometown Broncos.
(AP Photo/Scott Marshall) By Conor Ryan January 19, 2026 | 6:37 PM 2 minutes to read Derrick White plays for the Boston Celtics.

title: Rex Ryan thinks Bill Belichick is a ‘name to watch’ for Bills’ head coaching role
author: Hayden Bird
bullets: New England Patriots Buffalo fired Sean McDermott on Monday morning, instantly setting off speculation about several potential candidates.
Ryan, himself a former Bills HC, put Belichick's name forward.
North Carolina head coach Bill Belichick on the sidelines before an NCAA college football game Saturday, against Stanford, Nov.

title: Ann Michael Maye wears fan favorite sweatshirt for Patriots win over Texans
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: New England Patriots The "I [Heart] Drake Maye" shirts have taken over the Boston sports sphere over the last few months.
Ann Michael Maye work a "I [Heart] Drake Maye" hoodie on Sunday.

Annmichaelmaye / TikTok By Conor Ryan January 19, 2026 | 8:01 AM 2 minutes to read FOXBOROUGH — If you’ve been to Gillette Stadium, TD Garden, or just about any sports bar in New England over the last few months, odds are that you’ve seen the “I [Heart] Drake Maye” shirts.

title: Kayshon Boutte’s highlight-reel catch vs. Texans was déjà vu for Drake Maye
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: New England Patriots "He continues to show up, game in and game out.

title: What Mike Vrabel said about another up-and-down playoff performance from Drake Maye
author: Khari A. Thompson
bullets: New England Patriots Maye had three touchdowns, including a highlight-reel throw to Kayshon Boutte.
He also had four fumbles and three turnovers.
Drake Maye AP Photo/Robert F.

title: With a Super Bowl berth within sight, Patriots aren’t playing with ‘house money’ anymore
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: New England Patriots A win next Sunday against a banged-up Broncos team would punch New England's ticket to Super Bowl LX.
Drake Maye and the Patriots have a chance to go to the Super Bowl next week with a win in Denver.
